graph.topic: Museums as a form of entertainment or education?

nodes.text: museums such as art and music can offer people with a wide range of entertainment activities
they often organise traditional music events performed by local or other famous artists that people can attend to and enjoy to some extent
many visitors nowadays may choose to come to museums just for pleasure or as one of the activities that they take part in their holiday trips
This, therefore, makes museums a place to entertain in people leisure time
the establishment of a particular museum like history, science, or oceanography is usually attached to educational purposes
school and university students and teachers are always the guests of museums
the places are where they can discover and obtain a large amount of information related to their studies and teaching
there are a number of seminars and conferences held at museums that are informative and necessary for scholars and experts in their fields of research
museums prove the supporting role in human education
visiting museums is clearly seen as both means of entertainment and education
people should perceive the value of museums in enhancing their own knowledge
